attributes.action: Let driving tests keep taking place within any tier
attributes.additional_details: Having failed my driving test previously, I hoped I would be able to pass my test the next time I did it. However it has been rearranged since August 202 all the way through to January 2021. Now we are in Tier 4 I have no chance of passing my test any time soon and I need to pass if I want to drive to get to my hospital placement and university. The same goes for my friend who has had 7 tests now and had a test rearranged every month. We need the tests so we can pass so we can drive and be safer
attributes.background: Driving lessons and driving tests have been cancelled and postponed for all of 2020. I understand the risk of lessons and tests but as I have already taken tests and failed I need to do my test again and I need to drive to get to work instead of public transport

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Exempt driving tests and lessons from COVID-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
